statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT name, email, preferences FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT customer_id, name, city FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York' AND preferences->>'category' = 'sports'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age < 25 AND city IN ('Los Angeles', 'San Francisco') ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_phone, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, preference_category, preference_value FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE preference_category = 'Product' ORDER BY preference_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '+1%';
SELECT preference_category, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY preference_category DESC;
SELECT customer_name, preference_category FROM customers INNER JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id WHERE preference_category = 'Food';

SELECT customers.customer_name, preferences.preference_value FROM customers LEFT JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_id % 2 = 0 ORDER BY customers.customer_name ASC, preferences.preference_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT customer_name, product_name, rating FROM customers c JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE rating >= 4
SELECT category, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products GROUP BY category HAVING avg_price > 50
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, registration_date FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, category, subcategory FROM products WHERE price < 1000;
SELECT recommendation_id, customer_id, product_id, recommendation_score, recommendation_date FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC, recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price, category, description FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT preference_value, subcategory FROM preferences WHERE category = 'Music' AND subcategory = 'Pop';

SELECT c.first_name, r.product_id, p.product_name, r.recommendation_score FROM customers c JOIN recommendations r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE r.recommendation_score > 4.5 ORDER BY r.recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, city, state FROM customers INNER JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_name, preference_type, preference_value FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id
